name: Twitter search smooth scrolling
author: Patrick Kalkman

sections.description: This widget shows tweets in real-time that match a given search term. The search term can be changed in the options screen of the widget. Links or Mentions are changes so they become actual links. The tweets show using a smooth scrolling and easing effect. All animation parameters can be changed via the options screen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget on the your Blog via Appearance -> Widgets4
  4. Change the settings on the options form and save.
sections.faq:
What is the frequency used to retrieve new tweets

This is configurable via the options forms.
